data.text: @APWADiana Mighty busy of late. Finally got to register today but missed out on the  Hilton President with my Chapter. I've heard much good of the impact the streetcar has had downtown. I'll have to load Kingston Trio's "Charlie on the MTA" in my tunes and give it a play on one a trip.

@TONrmerson then the street car will be your friend! We'll have shuttle that runs from the Crown Center hotels to the convention center but honestly, I think the street car will be faster and certainly  more fun. See you soon Rick!
